entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning before morning except light snow inland. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
